name: Houndoom
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.

poke_body.name: Revenge Fang
poke_body.effect: If you have less Benched Pokémon than your opponent, each of Houndoom’s attacks does 40 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Burning Sensation
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 {R} Energy attached to Houndoom.
